entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 12:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 36 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
